markdownRemark.excerpt: Just download either the 32-bit or the 64-bit releases - unzip and run the dropboxd executable. Very easy. It even shows a status icon in your status-tray.
markdownRemark.html: Just download either the 32-bit or the 64-bit releases - unzip and run the dropboxd executable. Very easy. It even shows a status icon in your status-tray.

frontmatter.title: Indian govt to develop it's own OS and why you should be supportive.
